subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Juventus celebrated its third straight Serie A title, which it claimed two weeks ago, with a 3-0 home win over Cagliari to set a European record of 102 points in Turin, Italy.
snippet: Juventus celebrated its third straight Serie A title, which it claimed two weeks ago, with a 3-0 home win over Cagliari to set a European record of 102 points in Turin, Italy.
